product.title: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
product.description: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the mayfair ash dimout makes it an excellent choice. The smooth single-tone fabric enjoys natural shading courtesy of the pleated ripples that run the length of the blind, creating natural highlights and deepening shadows throughout. The innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes from your window without leaving a trace.
